Bases: object

Generates IR zero-rate trajectories for the Ultimate Base Curve model.

Notes on architecture: - This belongs under xva_engine/simulation/generators (trajectory generation). - It consumes market data (discount curve + history) from your market_data layer. - It returns a numpy cube (paths, times, pillars). You can wrap into your Cube later.
